title: [综合][信息]MsJoin——加入和退出服务器信息[1.8-1.12]
author: 星☆光
txt_content:
本帖最后由 星☆光 于 2020-7-25 10:37 编辑 
插件简介这个插件可以设置玩家进出服务器的信息
 图片欣赏




360截图20171001114443588.jpg (2.9 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-10-1 11:48 上传





食用方法1.下载此插件
2.丢进plugins文件夹
3.重启服务器

指令&权限无

 配置文件#Autor: yurirp4
#version: Prime
#variables: %player%
#this plugin was made by a Brazilian
#Creator channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpAddeks1LObI281qvD3jNw

JoinChat: true
#if you want to leave the message in chat enabled put True or to disable put false
Join_Chat: '&2%player% &a加入了服务器'
#message on entry
#
#
Joinactionbar: true
#if you want to leave the message in actionbar enabled put True or to disable put false
Join_Actionbar: '&2%player% &a加入了服务器'
#message on entry
#
#
Quitactionbar: true
#if you want to leave the message in chat enabled put True or to disable put false
quit_Actionbar: '&4%player% &c离开了服务器'
#message on exit
#
#
QuitChat: true
#if you want to leave the message in actionbar enabled put True or to disable put false
quit_Chat: '&4%player% &c离开了服务器'
#message on exit
复制代码


下载地址
汉化文件  



config.yml

replies.txt_content: 用处不大，因为superjoin已经包含这个机制。
